messages.title: Brexit
messages.content: The Lib Dems are united in the fight against a Hard Brexit. We want people to have a say on the final deal in a referendum.

messages.title: The NHS
messages.content: We will fight for the funding and staffing the NHS needs and give mental health the same importance as physical health.

messages.title: Economy
messages.content: The Lib Dems slashed taxes for the lowest paid when in government. Now the Tories are making harsh cuts that we blocked.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to a Hard Brexit and advocacy of a referendum on the final deal.
Advocacy for increased funding and staffing for the NHS, with equal focus on mental health.
Previous accomplishments in tax cuts for the lowest paid and opposition to the current government's fiscal cuts.

issues.brexitEurope: The Lib Dems are united in the fight against a Hard Brexit.
issues.economy: The Lib Dems slashed taxes for the lowest paid when in government.
issues.health: We will fight for the funding and staffing the NHS needs and give mental health the same importance as physical health.

images.caption: The leaflet features a portrait of Sarah Lesiter-Burgess, a request to display the poster, and statements on Brexit, the NHS, and the economy.
